text: Balunah allahara anugatya kara ebam rasulera anugatya kara. Atahpara yadi tomara mukha phiriye na'o, tabe tara upara n'yasta dayitbera jan'ye se dayi ebam tomadera upara n'yasta dayitbera jan'ye tomara dayi. Tomara yadi tamra anugatya kara, tabe sat patha pabe. Rasulera dayitba to kebala suspastarupe pauche deya.
